Specifies the concept mapping for the internal OpenMRS Uuid identifier type and the concept in the terminology system associated to the URI set via the global property named ${project.parent.artifactId}.identifier.type.concept.source.uri
Specifies the URL to use for the health center extension

Specifies the uuid of the person attribute type for home phone number
Specifies the URI of the terminology system for the concepts mapped to relationship types in OpenMRS

Comma-separated list of mappings between OpenMRS relationship type uuids for person A and concepts in the terminology system associated to the URI set via the global property named ${project.parent.artifactId}.relationship.type.concept.source.uri, should be of the form relationshipTypeUuid-1:conceptCode1:conceptDisplay1,relationshipTypeUuid-2:conceptCode2:conceptDisplay2 e.g a5c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:M:Mother,b7c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:L:Lawyer

Comma-separated list of mappings between OpenMRS relationship type uuids for person B and concepts in the terminology system associated to the URI set via the global property named ${project.parent.artifactId}.relationship.type.concept.source.uri, should be of the form relationshipTypeUuid-1:conceptCode1:conceptDisplay1,relationshipTypeUuid-2:conceptCode2:conceptDisplay2 e.g a5c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:CH:Child,b7c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:CL:Client
Specifies the URI of the terminology system for the concepts mapped to patient identifier types in OpenMRS

Specifies the URI of the namespace for the patient identifiers, this will be set as the value of the system property for all the identifiers, MUST match one of the internalId URLs defined in the OpenCR config file

Comma-separated list of mappings between OpenMRS patient identifier type uuids and concepts in the terminology system associated to the URI set via the global property named ${project.parent.artifactId}.identifier.type.concept.source.uri, should be of the form identifierTypeUuid-1:conceptCode1:conceptDisplay1,identifierTypeUuid-2:conceptCode2:conceptDisplay2 e.g b6c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:NID:National ID,c6c97a9d-a77b-401f-b06e-81900e21ed1e:SSN:Social Security Number. The code for the NID patient identifier type MUST match the values set in the docker config, PatientRelationship.json and decisionRules.json files.
